website_summaries.verdict: A microneedle derma roller that's designed to be comfortable in your hand and on your skin.
pros: Needles give you the benefit without the pain
cons: A few users have complained about bent needles

customer_reviews.title: After I applied my moisturizer with spf and my face feels amazing!! Normally I have to reapply after I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious at first. My skin is VERY sensitive and I was worried this would have a reaction to my skin. I was pleasantly surprised! I took a shower after my workout and having cleaned the house all day, scrubbed my face with my normals face wash and the rolled my face with the derma roller. After I applied my moisturizer with spf and my face feels amazing!! Normally I have to reapply after I’ve gotten dressed and then again later on because my skin is so dry. I’ve applied once and my skin still feels great! I would highly recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jordan

customer_reviews.title: THE ADELIE DERMAROLLER
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing a derma roller and I am satisfied with this. It makes sense that rolling this on your skin will allow the fantastic frankincense oil and other costly serums to sink more deeply into skin thereby enhancing the rejuvenating effects of those products. I admit, I was a tiny bit scared it would hurt but it does not. It's invigorating. I do not press hard and recommend you do the same. The needles are very small and fine. About the same size as acupuncture needles. I always wanted an accupuncture facial but they are rather costly. I feel this gives the same results. Pretty handle that feels good to hold, it's well made.
customer_reviews.author: 00_jackie_00

customer_reviews.title: Excellent skin care tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to improve my skin. This is far more than just a tool. It improves lines, wrinkles and collagen in the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: But product wise- I am happy with the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure when I should look for results- and I definitely don't use it as regular since info says not to use makeup within 24 hours! But product wise- I am happy with the price and quality. I started out with this 0.25MM since this was my first. I do feel some "damage" after using it so I would be scared to jump up.... I have seen some that look crazy painful- this one is just right for me. I hope that even though its only 0.25 it is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn - Texas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've only had the chance to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've only had the chance to use this twice. After each time, my face feels instantly smoother. As I've gotten older I've done more research on my skin. In particular my face. Unsure as to what lasting benefits I will receive from using this but am hopeful to find out. I will update about everything I experience whilst using this.
customer_reviews.author: SwiftySwifterson

customer_reviews.title: Very good with the extra needles
customer_reviews.text: Very nice with the extra number of needles. Ordered another one for backup because I like it so much!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: So far so good , I’m using this to stimulate my growth on my edges. I shaved my edges off after having a bad hair experience with my hairdresser. I had Major patchy bald spots so I shaved my edges hopefully this will help...

Will continue to use on regular basis. The first try involved very, very minor discomfort or sting, but after that first go around barely feel anything. very happy with this purchase and so worth it.

I put some oil first and use this and my lips look and feel plump. This has very tiny needles so it wasn’t bad actually. Still trying to get the courage to use it all over my face but for now i really like using it on my lips. It’s also had the CE symbol and it comes in a sealed container which makes me feel that it’s a quality product.

customer_reviews.text: I followed directions for 6 weeks, primarily for one broken vein on cheek. It wasn't painful, however, I found it unpleasant, and even with light pressure, I had some bleeding. End result, no noticeable difference, nothing, vein is still there.

customer_reviews.title: Product Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The packaging took quite a lot of effort to get into and I had to take scissors to the plastic container because the product wouldn't fit through the opening. The instructions on the box suggest that you shouldn't use more than the indicated time but there are no instructions as to how to use this product or how long the indicated time should be. It says not to reuse the head but then it says to always keep it clean. Very ambiguous and highly lacking instructional materials. Wish I had bought from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Karin M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Really flimsy, you can’t even feel the needles.

customer_reviews.title: It easily mounted on the dash of my semi truck and ...
customer_reviews.text: It easily mounted on the dash of my semi truck and can hold my phone with a protective case that is also a back-up battery making it heavier then a standard phone. The metal plate stuck right on the back of the case. This is hands down the best phone holder I have use and I have used many of them. It is simple, practical and it works. The design of the holder is attractive and low profile --you can hardly tell is even there. My issue with the other phone holders is that they are big, cumbersome, and distracting when attached to the windshield This phone holder addresses and solves all those problems. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SIMPLY USEFUL

customer_reviews.title: Far better than 540 needles
customer_reviews.text: I had a 540 version. Just junk apparently. The pins are nod needles in the 540 version. This one has actual needles. Although this is only 0.25 mm, which is super short, it actually feels far more intense than a 540 needle version thats twice as long. This maybe because it has far less needles, hence, the pressure applied in over fewer needles, and deeper depth reached. Also these are sharper. My face is red right now! from 0.25mm. very happy with this. Buying longer versions of the 192 for my hair now.
customer_reviews.author: Malibu Shary

customer_reviews.title: Changed my skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m a product junkie. This is by far my favorite new face product that I will never be without. It does not hurt- I actually enjoy doing it. I immediately spritz facial toner and then apply hyrolonic acid while the toner is wet. The roller allows the product to absorb faster and it almost gives your face a plumper look. It is even made the appearance of my acne scars look better
customer_reviews.author: yoga momma

customer_reviews.title: The slightly hurts like a light burning sensation when rolled over more softer ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause I wanted to know what all the new hype was about and now I finally understand. I was skeptical at first but this really does work. The slightly hurts like a light burning sensation when rolled over more softer areas of the face , but the next day that area looks healthier and brighter. I like how this item was wrapped in a medical grade plastic when first bought and that there is a case to put it in. Also the material is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Linseyb

customer_reviews.title: Go easy the first time with tool!
customer_reviews.text: Thus roller is like going to the aesthetician for microneedling. I have had several microneedling sessions and this tool is gre as t to use on those problem areas of your skin. Remember to: clean your face well, Apply a good Vit. C/hyaluronic serum while using the needling tool, Apply a good lotion with sunscreen immediately after using the tool, and as many times a day as your skin becomes dry. I use tool 2 weeks apart, NO SOONER!
customer_reviews.author: JulieLasVegas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Face looks a bit plumber afterwards. Just make sure your using a good serum before. The next day my face looked a bit more clear and brighter. The needle wasn’t as sharp as some others which I think is better.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLENE Naim

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I submitted a review for a different microneedling tool, and accidentally, i meant to review this one! this one did nothing for my face.. \might as well have used some 'balled up' paper towels!! Oh, well... thanks
customer_reviews.author: ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Good option for someone new to derm
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter if you want to try the derm roller craze. I like that it tingles the skin but doesn’t burn and it does seem to make my facial treatments soak in better. I would use once a week to start and be gentle as you glide onto your face and avoid eyes. It does come professionally packaged which I liked since you want a tool like this to come very clean and sterile.
customer_reviews.author: Jlee

customer_reviews.title: Too harsh on skin...but it improves
customer_reviews.text: Update: After using many times my skin can take it. Cleared scars before my eyes on my arms! WORKS. Let me start by saying I have tough skin! This roller on both occasions of use left roller marks on my face. This doesnt happen with the other roller I have-EVER.

customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty new to microneedling. Surprisingly, it doesn’t hurt so bad and I was able to see some results after first use.

product_meta.title: Derma Roller Cosmetic Microdermabrasion Instrument for Face, 192-Pin-Titanium Gold Skin Care Derma Roller (0.25 mm) - Includes Free Storage Case
product_meta.description:
DERMA ROLLER 192-TITANIUM-GOLD-SKINCARE TOOL

🌹 Used Method
1. Cleanse your face thoroughly and pat dry with a clean towel
2. Clean the head of Skin care tool (0.25mm) with alcohol
3. Does not force the roller on to your skin, only apply mild pressure? Roll the tool in up-down, left-right and in diagonal motions 4 to 8 times each area.
4. Wash the roller under hot running water and the dip in alcohol after each use and let air-dry. When the tool is completely dry you can store it in a plastic container to avoid damage between uses.
5. This product can be used repeatedly but is strictly for personal use.
6. Safe for home use.

🌹 Caution
1. Do not use on the following skin conditions: contagious skin, active acne, psoriasis, and infections.
2. It should be stored in the supplier plastic box for maximum hygiene and safety after use.
3. Keep out of reach of children

🌹 Why choose our Titanium Skin Care Tool?
1. Safe
2. No side effect
3. Obvious effect in short time
4. Ever best technology for staying young
5. Home use, easy conduct
feature_bullets: ✅PERFECT SKIN – Trying to get your skin to cooperate with you can be a daunting task. Our Derma Roller is the cosmetic tool you need to add to your skincare routine. Our derma roller is the key to beautiful and glowing skin. Micro needles help dramatically increase the effects of your favorite skin serums, creams, and moisturizers – up to 500%. Find out for yourself why people are in love with our micro needle derma roller.

✅UNLEASH YOUR BEAUTY – The microneedling instrument serves as a tool to puncture the epidermis, allowing skincare products to work to their maximum potential. Turn back the clock - shed away old dry skin to unveil the youthful radiant complexion you’ve been longing for. Skin care has never been so easy!

✅SAFE TREATMENT – Our derma roller is a non-invasive cosmetic needling instrument that is safe for home use. Most derma rollers have an excessive 540 micro needles, causing invasive skin punctures and a painful experience. But our NEW edition derma roller has the perfect balanced amount of 192 needles and meets the esthetician-recommended 0.25mm length. Now you can enjoy gentle yet effective microneedling topical treatments without the risk of damaging your skin!

✅PREMIUM QUALITY – Our team at Beauty strives to provide the highest quality skincare experience. Our derma roller is exceptionally durable and ergonomic. It feels luxurious and comfortable in hand. We use real titanium needles that are guaranteed to not break, bend, or dull. Our care for quality is proven by the results of the derma roller.

✅AFFORDABLE QUALITY – Professional facial microneedling treatments cost hundreds if not thousands of dollars (plus hours at the clinic). With consistent use, you can see a difference for less than the price of a week’s worth of lattes!
